title: Pizza Hut 3 with Brendan James
itunes:title: Pizza Hut 3 with Brendan James
description:
Brendan James (Blowback Season 3), joins the 'boys to talk Gru, Groot, Goop, and Grunty before a review of Pizza Hut. Plus, another edition of Slop Quiz.

Sources for this week's intro:
https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0063462/?ref_=nm_flmg_dr_11

https://www.britannica.com/biography/Mel-Brooks

https://www.mtishows.com/show-history/1677#:~:text=The%20Producers%20is%20a%20musical,Glen%20Kelly%20and%20Doug%20Besterman

https://www.mentalfloss.com/article/70987/15-things-you-might-not-know-about-pizza-hut
